name: Loss of Fluid
description:
No hydraulic pressure..

Control surfaces are dead..

Fuel is streaming out of the tank..

There is only one way to control the airplane..


Delicately control the power of your 2 engines and get to the nearest runway for an emergency landing!

The situation is VERY loosely based on a real life incident

Made for #LD34
by Ivan Notaros
@Nothke
